meanings.definition: The quality or state of being disjointed.
meanings.sent1: The disjointedness of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to put together.
meanings.sent2: The disjointedness of his speech made it difficult to follow his train of thought.
meanings.sent3: The disjointedness of the conversation left everyone confused.
meanings.sent4: The disjointedness of the team's strategy led to their defeat.
meanings.sent5: The disjointedness of the music added an interesting twist to the performance.
